entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
